verses.verse: Then sang <WH7891> Moses <WH4872> and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> this song <WH7892> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, and spake <WH559>, saying <WH559>, I will sing <WH7891> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, for he hath triumphed <WH1342> gloriously <WH1342>: The horse <WH5483> and his rider <WH7392> hath he thrown <WH7411> into the sea <WH3220>.

Jehovah <WH3050> is my strength <WH5797> and song <WH2176>, And he <WH2088> is become my salvation <WH3444>: This <WH2088> is my God <WH410>, and I will praise him <WH1>; My father's God <WH430>, and I will exalt him <WH7311>.
Jehovah <WH3068> is a man <WH376> of war <WH4421>: Jehovah <WH3068> is his name <WH8034>.
Pharaoh <WH6547>'s chariots <WH4818> and his host <WH2428> hath he cast <WH3384> into the sea <WH3220>; And his chosen <WH4005> captains <WH7991> are sunk <WH2883> in the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220>.
The deeps <WH8415> cover <WH3680> them <WH3381>: They went down into the depths <WH4688> like <WH3644> a stone <WH68>.
Thy right hand <WH3225>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, is glorious <WH142> in power <WH3581>, Thy right hand <WH3225>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, dasheth in pieces <WH7492> the enemy <WH341>.

And in the greatness <WH7230> of thine excellency <WH1347> thou overthrowest <WH2040> them that rise up against <WH6965> thee <WH7971>: Thou sendest forth thy wrath <WH2740>, it consumeth <WH398> them as stubble <WH7179>.

And with the blast <WH7307> of thy nostrils <WH639> the waters <WH4325> were piled <WH6192> up <WH5140>, The floods stood upright <WH5324> as a heap <WH5067>; The deeps <WH8415> were congealed <WH7087> in the heart <WH3820> of the sea <WH3220>.

The enemy <WH341> said <WH559>, I will pursue <WH7291>, I will overtake <WH5381>, I will divide <WH2505> the spoil <WH7998>; My desire <WH5315> shall be satisfied <WH4390> upon them <WH7324>; I will draw my sword <WH2719>, my hand <WH3027> shall destroy them <WH3423>.
Thou didst blow <WH5398> with thy wind <WH7307>, the sea <WH3220> covered <WH3680> them <WH6749>: They sank as lead <WH5777> in the mighty <WH117> waters <WH4325>.
Who is like unto thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah, among the gods <WH410>? Who is like thee <WH142>, glorious in holiness <WH6944>, Fearful <WH3372> in praises <WH8416>, doing <WH6213> wonders <WH6382>?
Thou stretchedst out <WH5186> thy right hand <WH3225>, The earth <WH776> swallowed them <WH1104>.

Thou in thy lovingkindness <WH2617> hast led <WH5148> the people <WH5971> that <WH2098> thou hast redeemed <WH1350>: Thou hast guided <WH5095> them in thy strength <WH5797> to thy holy <WH6944> habitation <WH5116>.
The peoples <WH5971> have heard <WH8085>, they tremble <WH7264>: Pangs <WH2427> have taken hold <WH270> on the inhabitants <WH3427> of Philistia <WH6429>.

Then <WH227> were the chiefs <WH441> of Edom <WH123> dismayed <WH926>; The mighty men <WH352> of Moab <WH4124>, trembling <WH7461> taketh hold <WH270> upon them <WH3427>: All the inhabitants of Canaan <WH3667> are melted away <WH4127>.

Terror <WH367> and dread <WH6343> falleth <WH5307> upon them <WH1419>; By the greatness of thine arm <WH2220> they are as still <WH1826> as a stone <WH68>; Till thy people <WH5971> pass over <WH5674>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, Till the people <WH5971> pass over <WH5674> that <WH2098> thou hast purchased <WH7069>.

Thou wilt bring <WH935> them in <WH5193>, and plant them in the mountain <WH2022> of thine inheritance <WH5159>, The place <WH4349>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, which thou hast made <WH6466> for thee to dwell in <WH3427>, The sanctuary <WH4720>, O Lord <WH136>, which thy hands <WH3027> have established <WH3559>.
Jehovah <WH3068> shall reign <WH4427> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5769>.

For the horses <WH5483> of Pharaoh <WH6547> went in <WH935> with his chariots <WH7393> and with his horsemen <WH6571> into the sea <WH3220>, and Jehovah <WH3068> brought back <WH7725> the waters <WH4325> of the sea <WH3220> upon them <WH1121>; but the children of Israel <WH3478> walked <WH1980> on dry <WH3004> land in the midst <WH8432> of the sea <WH3220>.

And Miriam <WH4813> the prophetess <WH5031>, the sister <WH269> of Aaron <WH175>, took <WH3947> a timbrel <WH8596> in her hand <WH3027>; and all the women <WH802> went out <WH3318> after <WH310> her with timbrels <WH8596> and with dances <WH4246>.

And Miriam <WH4813> answered <WH6030> them <WH7891>, Sing ye to Jehovah <WH3068>, for he hath triumphed <WH1342> gloriously <WH1342>; The horse <WH5483> and his rider <WH7392> hath he thrown <WH7411> into the sea <WH3220>.

And Moses <WH4872> led Israel <WH3478> onward <WH5265> from the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220>, and they went out <WH3318> into the wilderness <WH4057> of Shur <WH7793>; and they went <WH3212> three <WH7969> days <WH3117> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and found <WH4672> no water <WH4325>.

And when they came <WH935> to Marah <WH4785>, they could <WH3201> not drink <WH8354> of the waters <WH4325> of Marah <WH4785>, for they were bitter <WH4751>: therefore the name <WH8034> of it was called <WH7121> Marah <WH4785>.
And the people <WH5971> murmured <WH3885> against Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>, What shall we drink <WH8354>?

An he cried <WH6817> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; And Jehovah <WH3068> showed <WH3384> him a tree <WH6086>, and he cast <WH7993> it into the waters <WH4325>, and the waters <WH4325> were made sweet <WH4985>. There he made <WH7760> for them a statute <WH2706> and an ordinance <WH4941>, and there he proved them <WH5254>;

and he said <WH559>, If thou wilt diligently <WH8085> hearken <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and wilt do <WH6213> that which is right <WH3477> in his eyes <WH238>, and wilt give ear to his commandments <WH4687>, and keep <WH8104> all his statutes <WH2706>, I will put <WH7760> none of the diseases <WH4245> upon thee <WH7760>, which I have put upon the Egyptians <WH4714>: for I am Jehovah <WH3068> that healeth thee <WH7495>.

And they came <WH935> to Elim <WH362>, where were twelve <WH8147> springs <WH5869> of water <WH4325>, and threescore and ten <WH7657> palm-trees <WH8558>: and they encamped <WH2583> there by the waters <WH4325>.
